title: Delicious pizza
text: We stopped here after seeing the blue bell Forrest. They didn’t speak any English, but were very kind and helpful. Food was fast and soo good. Best tiramisu I’ve ever had.

title: So cool!!
text: I loved the acropolis! It was beautiful, I only wish I was able to see it 500 years ago. There were people everywhere, and it was only April. The walk up to it is really cool too, you get to see a lot of very old statues and pretty views!

title: Kinda cool, but you can see it for free
text: You can pretty much see everything from the outside and even get some good pictures. There is a small church on the inside with art that changes. It was about world war 2 in Greece, this time. If you have time for it do it. if not don’t worry, you aren’t missing much

title: My favorite restaurant in Athens
text: The food was very good and the women working are so sweet! The poffies are different and so good. The pasta is a big serving and the food is really cheap. Definitely get more than you pay for!!
